4C Foods Corp. is the epitome of the American dream. Beginning as a small family grocery store & cheese business in Brooklyn New York in 1935, 4C Foods has grown to be one of America’s premier manufactures of grated Italian cheeses, bread crumbs, iced tea and drink mixes.
